story:
Once upon a time, in a land far, far away, there was a beautiful city called Samarra. This city was known for its lush gardens, tall palm trees, and the famous spiral minaret that towered over the city.

In Samarra, there lived a kind and generous merchant named Ali. Ali had a beautiful wife, Aisha, and three wonderful children: Hassan, Hussain, and Fatima. The family was well-respected in the community for their generosity and kindness.

One day, Ali received a shipment of rare and exotic spices from the Far East. The spices were unlike anything the people of Samarra had ever tasted before. Ali knew that these spices would be a hit, so he decided to host a grand feast for the entire city.

The day of the feast finally arrived, and the people of Samarra gathered in Ali's courtyard. The air was filled with the aroma of delicious food, and the children played together while the adults chatted and laughed.

As the sun began to set, Ali stood up to make an announcement. He thanked everyone for coming and announced that he had a special surprise for them. He then called his children to come forward.

Hassan, Hussain, and Fatima each carried a small box. As they opened the boxes, the crowd gasped in amazement. Inside each box was a small seed.

Ali explained that these seeds were from the legendary Tree of Life. He had obtained them from a wise old sage who had told him that the tree had the power to grant a single wish to whoever planted and cared for the seed.

Ali told the crowd that he wanted to share the seeds with the people of Samarra, so that they too could make a wish. He asked them to plant the seeds in their gardens and to care for them with love and attention.

The people of Samarra were overjoyed and grateful for Ali's generosity. They took the seeds home and planted them with great care.

In the months that followed, something magical happened. The seeds began to grow into beautiful trees, each one taller and more majestic than the last. And as the trees grew, so did the wishes of the people of Samarra.

Some wished for wealth and prosperity, while others wished for good health and happiness. And as the wishes were granted, the city of Samarra flourished and became known as the most prosperous and happy city in the land.

And so, the story of the Tree of Life became a beloved tale passed down from generation to generation. And every time the tale was told, the people of Samarra were reminded of the importance of generosity, kindness, and the power of a single wish.

Now, my dear son, it's time for you to close your eyes and drift off to sleep. May your dreams be filled with magic and wonder, just like the story of the Tree of Life. Goodnight.
